wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: tae copy, distribute an transmit the wirk
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Ye must attribute the wirk in the manner specified bi the author or licensor (but nae in ony way that suggests that thay endorse ye or yer uise o the wirk).
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: If ye alter, transform, or big upon this wirk, ye mey distribute the resultin wirk anly unner the same or seemilar license tae this ane.
